half_double_crochet and chain 1 62 round 18 single_crochet in third loop around ** join to first single_crochet 62 fasten_off and sew in ends leesa nixon aka leesa s knotty corner ©2020-2021 this be 8-8 25 remember to always begin in the same stitch as the join round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 11 double_crochet in the magic_ring pull tight join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 11 round 2 2 double_crochet in the same stitch as join and in each stitch around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 22 round 3 beginning in the same stitch as join * 1 double_crochet in first stitch *2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat from *around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 33 round 4 *1 double_crochet in each of the first 2 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 44 round 5 *1 double_crochet in each of the first 3 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 55 round 6 *1 double_crochet in each of the first 4 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 66 round 7 *fpdc around first stitch bpdc around next stitch* repeat around **join to the first fpdc of the round and chain 2 66
